My game gets crashed after the TRAIN BLAST CUTSCENE , I AM EVEN running on Window mode and my ORIGIN is also open , Have updated and RE-CRACKED da GAME . Still dosent works . SOLUTIONS??

It could have to do with your firewall or AV blocking MOHWD, which is not the exe to start the game, but a different exe that exists in the Game subfolder. It seems that MOWHD  actually creates processes at certain points during the game. So if it cannot access it you get the black screen freeze, or a CTD.

Those having difficulties to proceed to load the car mission(hot pursuit) kindly
